amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt rules pertaining to the protection of public health or safety from the requirements of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 6 printed in part B of House Report 114-230 to exempt rules pertaining to the protection of the public health or safety from the requirements of the Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 242 (Roll no. 477).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 242 (Roll no. 477).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
